spec_data.Name: iguanaIR-reflasher
spec_data.Description:
This package provides the reflasher/testing script and assorted firmware
versions for the Iguanaworks USB IR transceiver.  If you have no idea
what this means, you don't need it.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 11:42:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Reflasher for Iguanaworks USB IR transceiver
